nodes.text: Dianogan tea was a type of tea. The Muun Separatist Admiral Pors Tonith possessed a strong predilection for dianogan tea, despite the fact that it stained his teeth a garish purple.

Dianogan tea was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Dianogan tea first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Jedi Trial, a 2004 novel authored by David Sherman and Dan Cragg.
